name: Tasks to combine everything we know

0.name: What keyword is used when creating a variable?

1.name: What is output to the console? console.log(typeof (7 >= 7));

2.name: What is used to test multiple problem conditions?

3.name: Choose the correct option for the execution priority of the logical operators (AND) && and (OR) ||

0.name: The (OR) operator || will be executed first, followed by (AND) &&

1.name: The (AND) && operator will be executed first, followed by (OR) ||

4.name: Which property returns the number of characters in the string?

5.name: Choose the correct way to refer to the first element of str.

6.name: Which method removes spaces at the beginning and at the end of a line?

7.name: What happens if I delete all the properties from an object?

0.name: It is not possible to remove all properties from an object

1.name: The object itself will be deleted

3.name: The last property will not be deleted

9.name: What does the hasOwnProperty() method check in the object?

0.name: Does the object have the property you are looking for

1.name: Does the object have a nested object

3.name: What is deleted in the object
